name: washing_getRemainingTime
description: This function is used to check the remaining time on a washing machine.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the SmartThings device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the SmartThings device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name of the SmartThings device that needs to have its remaining time checked.

parameters.name: compartment
parameters.description: The predefined compartment of the SmartThings device that needs to have its remaining time checked.

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: The group action for the SmartThings device that needs to have its remaining time checked.
